explains: n. 轻视，蔑视；忽视，不顾；藐视法庭
wordGroup: contempt of court 蔑视法庭；对法院的藐视罪
in contempt of 不顾；不把…放在眼里；藐视
beneath contempt 卑鄙到极点的

sentences.en: She looked at him with contempt.
His humour depended on contempt for others.
sentences.cn: 他的幽默基于对他人的蔑视。

sentences.en: He faced imprisonment for contempt of court.
sentences.cn: 他因藐视法庭罪而面临监禁。
